question: Who has been chosen as India's first 'Miss Trans Queen'?
explanation: Veena Sendre from Chhattisgarh has been chosen as India\'s first \'Miss Trans Queen\'. She defeated Namita Ammu of Tamil Nadu to claim the title at the national-level beauty contest organised in Mumbai on October 7. Sendre, a former Miss Chhattisgarh, belongs to Mandir Hasaud village in Raipur.
